nodes.bodyText: This is a binary breaking change. Is there a reason you are not just adding a null check on the call-site?
Guave Cache does not allow null values as mentioned in linked issue (#7197)
That doesn't mean this method needs to return an Optional.
Surely I can rename this to getRegionRenderCacheOptional and make the old method link it
Or just not change the method at all.
You can use a simple Optional.of(...) here since cache can not be null.
